sentence: And although vulnerable incumbent Senate Democrats such as Catherine Cortez Masto of Nevada and Mark Kelly of Arizona support banning lawmaker trades, they also say their constituents are far more concerned about the broader economy.
title: Dems' latest challenge: Draining the Hill's swamp (at least a little)

sentence: Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., called the scenes in the video "tragic," adding, "Vladimir Putin is now attacking civilians, which is clearly a war crime."
author: Tyler Olson
title: 'Heart-wrenching' Zelenskyy speech gives Congress 'vivid reminder' of Putin's brutal war

sentence: One of the stricter bills was introduced in January by Senators Jon Ossoff (D-GA) and Mark Kelly (D-AZ) and includes the legislators’ spouses and dependent children in the restrictions.
author: Cabot Phillips
title: Here’s How Members Of Congress Use Inside Information To Make Millions On The Stock Market
